welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fino Mornasco, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mostly used for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours after registration.
